template-1.SubjectPart: Enable MFA for your GitHub Account
template-1.TextPart:
Dear {{name}},
This is a reminder that your GitHub account with {{username}} is not MFA enabled.
Please enable MFA in your account, it will take hardly 5 minutes to activate MFA. Please refer this github url https://github.com/login/ to login. Accounts without MFA will be disabled after {{date}}.
Configuring User MFA

Your support is highly appreciable
Thanks in advance,
GitHub Team.
